Working at the Corporate office of International Business segment. Tracking and analyzing global markets, primarily Africa, for projects in Railways and Power Transmission and Distribution sector

Pitching value propositions to various governments; devising business expansion plans and sustainability roadmaps

positions.subtitle: Tata Projects
positions.description: Working with the team of Pune underground metro to gain comprehensive overview of project functioning, from handling project finances, planning work schedule to execution work. Major focus on commercial aspects, analyzing various cost reports and subcontracts to resolve emerging challenges. Forecasting work schedule changes on AOP, cashflow and P&L statement.

experience.title: Junior Member

experience.title: Coordinator
experience.description: The Entrepreneurship Cell is a non-profit organization run by the students of IIT Bombay that aims at manifesting the latent entrepreneurial spirit of the young students. We at E-Cell hosts various workshops, speaker sessions, innovative games, competitions for aspiring entrepreneurs and support them by providing necessary resources such as seed funding, mentoring, consultancy and networking.Initiatives•E-Summit: The annual flagship event, a networking hub for corporates, professionals and budding entrepreneurs from all across the nation.•Eureka!: Asia's largest B-Plan Competition as recognized by Thomson Reuters.•National Entrepreneurship Challenge(NEC) - Created with the vision to promote entrepreneurship amidst all the campuses in India, National Entrepreneurship Challenge is the first of its kind pan-India competition undertaken by The Entrepreneurship Cell , IIT Bombay.•EnB-Club: This new initiative aims to create an ecosystem for the budding entrepreneurs in the institute.
experience.description_html: The Entrepreneurship Cell is a non-profit organization run by the students of IIT Bombay that aims at manifesting the latent entrepreneurial spirit of the young students. We at E-Cell hosts various workshops, speaker sessions, innovative games, competitions for aspiring entrepreneurs and support them by providing necessary resources such as seed funding, mentoring, consultancy and networking.Initiatives•E-Summit: The annual flagship event, a networking hub for corporates, professionals and budding entrepreneurs from all across the nation.•Eureka!: Asia's largest B-Plan Competition as recognized by Thomson Reuters.•National Entrepreneurship Challenge(NEC) - Created with the vision to promote entrepreneurship amidst all the campuses in India, National Entrepreneurship Challenge is the first of its kind pan-India competition undertaken by The Entrepreneurship Cell , IIT Bombay.•EnB-Club: This new initiative aims to create an ecosystem for the budding entrepreneurs in the institute.

projects: [{"title":"Design of signal-free Vakola Junction","start_date":"Jan 2019","end_date":"May 2019","description":" Studying the existing traffic movement pattern at Vakola Junction near Mumbai’s domestic airport Proposal of new pattern, devoid of traffic signals, to be implemented by the Mumbai MetropolitanRegion Development Authority (MMRDA) Evaluating the performance of existing and proposed models using VISSIM software"},{"title":"IoT in Construction Industry","start_date":"Feb 2018","end_date":"May 2018","description":" Worked with an international student team on a project commissioned by the Saint-Gobain Group Researched Europe and US markets for Internet of Things (IoT) applications in construction products,design of buildings and construction management Analysed in detail the technical aspects as well as the business models of the products and services"}]
